package.name: mcr_gradlew
package.description:
This package provides a wrapper for the Java build system Gradle [1]. Other catkin packages can can include this wrapper instead of copying the associated files and directories (gradle/, gradlew) to their package directory.
To use the wrapper include the mcr_gradlew package in the CMakeLists.txt file: find_package(catkin REQUIRED mcr_gradlew)
After this the ${mcr_gradlew_GRADLEW_BIN} variable contains the file name (including the absolute path) to the "gradlew" binary in this package.
[1] http://www.gradle.org/
package.author: Sven Schneider
